title: How do I restore the TalkBand B2 to factory settings?
answer:
Make sure that your B2 is connected to your phone. 

Open the Huawei Wear Application and go to settings (Upper left corner). Touch "restore factory settings" to restore B2 to its factory settings. 

Note: If you restore your B2 to factory settings, all fitness, sleep and time data will be deleted. You will need to pair the device again.
